CustomField.description: If true, allows users to see the day name and date in the column header if, on the Manage Timecards To Approve page, Timecard Week Ending Date has been set and Include Overlaps is not selected, The default value is true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true, allows users to see the day name and date in the column header if, on the Manage Timecards To Approve page, Timecard Week Ending Date has been set and Include Overlaps is not selected, The default value is true.
CustomField.label: Show Week Dates As Column Headers
